entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
